CHAT: 通过在此框输入与您的合作者沟通！
AUTH: 请授权这个应用程序以保存您的作品并共享。
COLOUR_PICKER_TOOLTIP: 从调色板中选择一种颜色。
COLOUR_RGB_TOOLTIP: 通过指定红色、绿色和蓝色的量创建一种颜色。所有的值必须介于0和100之间。
COLOUR_BLEND_TOOLTIP: 用一个给定的比率(0.0-1.0)混合两种颜色。
CONTROLS_WHILEUNTIL_TOOLTIP_WHILE: 只要值为真，执行一些语句。
CONTROLS_WHILEUNTIL_TOOLTIP_UNTIL: 只要值为假，执行一些语句。
CONTROLS_FOR_TOOLTIP: 从起始数到结尾数中取出变量“%1”的值，按指定的时间间隔，执行指定的块。
CONTROLS_FOR_TITLE: 使用 %1 从范围 %2 到 %3 每隔 %4
CONTROLS_FOREACH_TITLE: 为每个项目 %1 在列表中 %2
CONTROLS_FOREACH_TOOLTIP: 遍历每个列表中的项目，将变量“%1”设定到该项中，然后执行某些语句。
CONTROLS_FLOW_STATEMENTS_TOOLTIP_CONTINU: 跳过这个循环的剩余部分，并继续下一次迭代。
CONTROLS_FLOW_STATEMENTS_WARNING: 警告：此块仅可用于在一个循环内。
CONTROLS_IF_TOOLTIP_1: 如果值为真，执行一些语句。
CONTROLS_IF_TOOLTIP_2: 如果值为真，则执行语句的第一块。否则，则执行语句的第二块。
CONTROLS_IF_TOOLTIP_3: 如果第一个值为真，则执行语句的第一个块。否则，如果第二个值为真，则执行语句的第二块。
CONTROLS_IF_TOOLTIP_4: 如果第一个值为真，则执行语句的第一块。否则，如果第二个值为真，则执行语句的第二块。如果没有值为真，则执行语句的最后一块。
CONTROLS_IF_IF_TOOLTIP: 增加、删除或重新排列各节来重新配置“if”块。
CONTROLS_IF_ELSEIF_TOOLTIP: 在if语句块中增加一个条件。
CONTROLS_IF_ELSE_TOOLTIP: 添加一个最终的，包括所有情况的节到if块中。
LOGIC_COMPARE_TOOLTIP_EQ: 如果两个输入结果相等，则返回真。
LOGIC_COMPARE_TOOLTIP_NEQ: 如果两个输入结果不相等，则返回真。
LOGIC_COMPARE_TOOLTIP_LT: 如果第一个输入结果比第二个小，则返回真。
LOGIC_COMPARE_TOOLTIP_LTE: 如果第一个输入结果小于或等于第二个输入结果，则返回真。
LOGIC_COMPARE_TOOLTIP_GT: 如果第一个输入结果比第二个大，则返回真。
LOGIC_COMPARE_TOOLTIP_GTE: 如果第一个输入结果大于或等于第二个输入结果，则返回真。
LOGIC_OPERATION_TOOLTIP_AND: 如果两个输入结果都为真，则返回真。
LOGIC_OPERATION_TOOLTIP_OR: 如果至少有一个输入结果为真，则返回真。
LOGIC_NEGATE_TOOLTIP: 如果输入结果为假，则返回真；如果输入结果为真，则返回假。
LOGIC_TERNARY_TOOLTIP: 检查“test”中的条件。如果条件为真，则返回“if true”的值，否则，则返回“if false”的值。
MATH_ARITHMETIC_TOOLTIP_POWER: 返回第一个数的第二个数次幂。
MATH_SINGLE_TOOLTIP_LN: 返回一个数的自然对数。
MATH_TRIG_TOOLTIP_SIN: 返回指定角度的正弦值(非弧度）。
MATH_TRIG_TOOLTIP_COS: 返回指定角度的余弦值(非弧度）。
MATH_TRIG_TOOLTIP_TAN: 返回指定角度的正切值(非弧度）。
MATH_TRIG_TOOLTIP_ASIN: 返回一个数的反正弦值。
MATH_TRIG_TOOLTIP_ACOS: 返回一个数的反余弦值。
MATH_TRIG_TOOLTIP_ATAN: 返回指定角度的反正切值。
MATH_IS_TOOLTIP: 如果数字是偶数、奇数、非负整数、正数、负数或如果它可被某数字整除，则返回真或假。
MATH_ONLIST_TOOLTIP_SUM: 返回列表中的所有数字的和。
MATH_ONLIST_TOOLTIP_AVERAGE: 返回列表中的数值的平均值。
MATH_ONLIST_TOOLTIP_MODE: 返回列表中的最常见的项的列表。
MATH_ONLIST_TOOLTIP_RANDOM: 从列表中返回一个随机的元素。
MATH_MODULO_TOOLTIP: 返回这两个数字相除后的余数。
MATH_CONSTRAIN_TITLE: 限制数字 %1 介于 (低) %2 到 (高) %3
MATH_CONSTRAIN_TOOLTIP: 限制数字介于两个指定的数字之间
MATH_RANDOM_INT_TITLE: 从 %1 到 %2 之间的随机整数
MATH_RANDOM_INT_TOOLTIP: 返回两个指定的范围（含）之间的随机整数。
MATH_RANDOM_FLOAT_TOOLTIP: 返回介于（包含）0.0到1.0之间的随机数。
TEXT_TEXT_TOOLTIP: 一个字母、单词或一行文本。
TEXT_JOIN_TOOLTIP: 通过串起任意数量的项以建立一段文字。
TEXT_CREATE_JOIN_TOOLTIP: 添加、移除或重新排列各节来重新配置这个文本块。
TEXT_CREATE_JOIN_ITEM_TOOLTIP: 将一个项添加到文本中。
TEXT_APPEND_TOOLTIP: 将一些文本追加到变量“%1”。
TEXT_LENGTH_TOOLTIP: 返回提供文本的字母数（包括空格）。
TEXT_ISEMPTY_TOOLTIP: 如果提供的文本为空，则返回真。
TEXT_INDEXOF_TOOLTIP: 返回在第二个字串中的第一/最后一个匹配项的索引值。如果未找到则返回 0。
TEXT_INDEXOF_OPERATOR_FIRST: 寻找第一个出现的文本
TEXT_INDEXOF_OPERATOR_LAST: 寻找最后一个出现的文本
TEXT_CHARAT_TOOLTIP: 返回位于指定位置的字母。
TEXT_GET_SUBSTRING_START_FROM_END: 取得一段字串自#到末尾
TEXT_GET_SUBSTRING_START_FIRST: 取得一段字串自第一个字符
TEXT_CHANGECASE_TOOLTIP: 使用不同的大小写复制这段文字。
TEXT_TRIM_TOOLTIP: 复制这段文字的同时删除两端多余的空格。
TEXT_PRINT_TOOLTIP: 打印指定的文字、数字或其他值。
TEXT_PROMPT_TYPE_TEXT: 输入数字并显示提示消息
TEXT_PROMPT_TYPE_NUMBER: 输入数字并显示提示消息
TEXT_PROMPT_TOOLTIP_TEXT: 提示用户输入一些文本。
LISTS_CREATE_EMPTY_TOOLTIP: 返回一个列表，长度为 0，不包含任何数据记录
LISTS_CREATE_WITH_TOOLTIP: 建立一个具有任意数量项目的列表。
LISTS_CREATE_WITH_CONTAINER_TOOLTIP: 增加、删除或重新排列各部分以此重新配置这个列表块。
LISTS_CREATE_WITH_ITEM_TOOLTIP: 将一个项添加到列表中。
LISTS_REPEAT_TOOLTIP: 建立包含指定重复次数的值的列表。
LISTS_REPEAT_TITLE: 建立列表使用项 %1 重复 %2 次
LISTS_ISEMPTY_TOOLTIP: 如果改列表为空，则返回真。
LISTS_INDEX_OF_TOOLTIP: 返回在列表中的第一/最后一个匹配项的索引值。如果找不到项目则返回0。
LISTS_GET_INDEX_TOOLTIP_GET_FROM_START: 返回在列表中的指定位置的项。#1是第一个项目。
LISTS_GET_INDEX_TOOLTIP_GET_FROM_END: 返回在列表中的指定位置的项。#1是最后一项。
LISTS_GET_INDEX_TOOLTIP_GET_FIRST: 返回列表中的第一个项目。
LISTS_GET_INDEX_TOOLTIP_GET_LAST: 返回列表中的最后一项。
LISTS_GET_INDEX_TOOLTIP_GET_RANDOM: 随机返回列表中的一个项目。
LISTS_GET_INDEX_TOOLTIP_GET_REMOVE_FROM_: 移除并返回列表中的指定位置的项。#1 是第一项。
移除并返回列表中的指定位置的项。#1 是最后一项。
LISTS_GET_INDEX_TOOLTIP_GET_REMOVE_FIRST: 移除并返回列表中的第一个项目。
LISTS_GET_INDEX_TOOLTIP_GET_REMOVE_LAST: 移除并返回列表中的最后一个项目。
LISTS_GET_INDEX_TOOLTIP_GET_REMOVE_RANDO: 移除并返回列表中的一个随机项目中。
LISTS_GET_INDEX_TOOLTIP_REMOVE_FROM_STAR: 移除在列表中的指定位置的项。#1 是第一项。
LISTS_GET_INDEX_TOOLTIP_REMOVE_FROM_END: 删除在列表中的指定位置的项。#1是最后一项。
LISTS_GET_INDEX_TOOLTIP_REMOVE_LAST: 移除列表中的最后一项
LISTS_GET_INDEX_TOOLTIP_REMOVE_RANDOM: 删除列表中的一个随机的项。
LISTS_SET_INDEX_TOOLTIP_SET_FROM_START: 设置在列表中指定位置的项。#1是第一项。
LISTS_SET_INDEX_TOOLTIP_SET_FROM_END: 设置在列表中指定位置的项。#1是最后一项。
LISTS_SET_INDEX_TOOLTIP_SET_FIRST: 设置列表中的第一个项目。
LISTS_SET_INDEX_TOOLTIP_SET_LAST: 设置列表中的最后一项。
LISTS_SET_INDEX_TOOLTIP_SET_RANDOM: 设置列表中一个随机的项目。
LISTS_SET_INDEX_TOOLTIP_INSERT_FROM_STAR: 插入在列表中指定位置的项。#1是第一项。
LISTS_SET_INDEX_TOOLTIP_INSERT_FROM_END: 插入在列表中的指定位置的项。#1是最后一项。
LISTS_SET_INDEX_TOOLTIP_INSERT_FIRST: 在列表的起始处添加该项。
LISTS_SET_INDEX_TOOLTIP_INSERT_LAST: 将该项追加到列表的末尾。
LISTS_GET_SUBLIST_TOOLTIP: 复制列表中指定的部分。
LISTS_SORT_TYPE_IGNORECASE: 按字母排序，忽略大小写
LISTS_SPLIT_TOOLTIP_SPLIT: 拆分文本到文本列表，按每个分隔符拆分。
LISTS_SPLIT_TOOLTIP_JOIN: 加入文本列表至一个文本，由分隔符分隔。
VARIABLES_SET_TOOLTIP: 设置此变量，以使它和输入值相等。
PROCEDURES_DEFNORETURN_TOOLTIP: 创建一个不带输出值的函数。
PROCEDURES_DEFRETURN_TOOLTIP: 创建一个有输出值的函数。
PROCEDURES_DEF_DUPLICATE_WARNING: 警告: 此函数具有重复参数。
PROCEDURES_CALLRETURN_TOOLTIP: 运行用户定义的函数“%1”，并使用它的输出值。
PROCEDURES_MUTATORCONTAINER_TOOLTIP: 添加、删除或重新排此函数的输入。
PROCEDURES_IFRETURN_TOOLTIP: 如果值为真，则返回第二个值。
PROCEDURES_IFRETURN_WARNING: 警告: 仅在定义函数内可使用此块。
MOTOR_ON_TOOLTIP: 按下电源按钮打开马达。
MOTOR_ON_FOR_TOOLTIP: 启动马达并且使马达转动指定角度后关闭它。
MOTORDIFF_ON_TOOLTIP: 当机器人按照指定的速度移动。
MOTORDIFF_ON_FOR_TOOLTIP: 启动机器人并让它按照指定速度前进，并在行驶指定的距离后停止。
MOTORDIFF_TURN_FOR_TOOLTIP: 将机器人转动指定的角度。
BRICKLIGHT_RESET_TOOLTIP: 复位主控机指示灯。设置默认状态为绿色并闪烁。
WAIT_TOOLTIP: 到某个条件判断为真之前一直等待。
LOOPFOREVER_TOOLTIP: 无限次循环执行一个动作。
IF_TOOLTIP: 检查 »如果« 语句中的值，如果值为真，那么运行 »执行« 语句中的动作。
TOUCH_ISPRESSED_TOOLTIP: 压力传感器是否被按下？
KEY_ISPRESSED_TOOLTIP: 选中的按钮是否被按下？
PIN_ISTOUCHED_TOOLTIP: 选中的脚针是否被按下？
ULTRASONIC_GETSAMPLE_TOOLTIP: 获取当前超声波传感器的值。
COLOUR_GETSAMPLE_TOOLTIP: 获取当前颜色传感器的值。
INFRARED_GETSAMPLE_TOOLTIP: 获取当前红外传感器的值。
ENCODER_GETSAMPLE_TOOLTIP: 获取当前马达编码器的值。
GYRO_GETSAMPLE_TOOLTIP: 获取当前陀螺仪传感器的值。
FLAME_GETSAMPLE_TOOLTIP: 获取当前火焰传感器的值。
TOUCH_TOOLTIP: 触摸传感器是否被按下？
PROCEDURES_VARIABLES_ERROR: 错误：这个积木块只能用在 »
PROCEDURES_VARIABLES_LOOP_ERROR: Error: This block may be used only within a loop which declares
CONNECTION_START_TOOLTIP: 尝试通过蓝牙连接另外一个机器人。
CONNECTION_WAIT_TOOLTIP: 通过蓝牙等待别的机器人连接。
CONNECTION_RECEIVE_TOOLTIP: 等待接受另一个机器人发送过来的消息。消息的格式在连接中被声明。
CONNECTION_SEND_TOOLTIP: 向另一个机器人发送消息。
CONNECTION_CHECK: 和机器人 %1 的连接有效吗？
CONNECTION_CHECK_TOOLTIP: 检查和机器人的连接是否有效。
POPUP_ABOUT_TEXT: The Open Roberta Lab is a cloud-based integrated programming environment that enables children and adolescents to program easily different robot systems. This platform is completely open source so taking part is desirable! Both the software and the open source developer tools are available via Fraunhofer servers.
POPUP_ABOUT_TEXT_DEV: The Open Roberta Lab is an open-source programming platform developed by Fraunhofer IAIS within the initiative »Roberta – Learning with Robots«
POPUP_ABOUT_TEXT_GOOG: Open Roberta was initiated in collaboration with Google Germany to reduce the hurdles for students, teachers and schools programming educational robots. Open Roberta is financed by Google.org (2014 - 2015) with 1Mio Euro.
POPUP_STARTUP_HIDE: Okay, don't show this window again and remember my choice.
POPUP_STARTUP_COOKIES: We use cookies to personalise content and to analyse our traffic.
POPUP_ROBOT_NOT_CONNECTED: You have to make a connection to your robot first.
POPUP_CONFIRM_DELETE_PROGRAM: Do you really want to delete the program ?
POPUP_CONFIRM_DELETE_CONFIGURATION: Do you really want to delete the configuration ?
POPUP_BEFOREUNLOAD: You have unsaved changes in your program or configuration. Sign in and save your program or configuration.
POPUP_BEFOREUNLOAD_LOGGEDIN: You have unsaved changes in your program or configuration.
POPUP_CONFIRM_UPDATE_FIRMWARE: There is a new firmware version for your robot available. You can try to run programs with the old version, but best bet is to update your robot now! You just have to click >>Update now<<.
MESSAGE_INVALID_NAME: Please fill in a correct name. A correct name begins with a letter and can only contain letters or numbers.
MESSAGE_EDIT_START: Your program $ will run in a moment!
MESSAGE_EDIT_SAVE_PROGRAM_AS: Your program has been saved as »$«
MESSAGE_EDIT_SAVE_CONFIGURATION_AS: Your configuration has been saved as »$«
MESSAGE_RESTART_ROBOT: Please reconnect the robot to the Open Roberta Lab.
MESSAGE_FIRMWARE_ERROR: There is a conflict with the firmware version of your robot and the Open Roberta Lab. Please contact us.
ORA_TOKEN_SET_ERROR_NO_ROBOT_WAITING:
Check if your robot is switched on and connected to the server.
If you have problems to do this, please have a look at our help pages.
ORA_TOOLBOX_ERROR_ID_INVALID: Toolbox name is not a valid identifier.
ORA_TOOLBOX_GET_ONE_ERROR_NOT_FOUND: The toolbox could not be found in the database.
ORA_TOOLBOX_SAVE_ERROR: An error has occurred while saving the toolbox.
ORA_TOOLBOX_DELETE_ERROR: An error has occurred while deleting the toolbox, please try it again!
ORA_TOOLBOX_SAVE_ERROR_NOT_SAVED_TO_DB: An error error has occurred while saving the configuration in the database.
ORA_CONFIGURATION_ERROR_ID_INVALID: Configuration name is not a valid identifier.
ORA_CONFIGURATION_GET_ONE_ERROR_NOT_FOUN: The robot configuration could not be found in the database.
ORA_CONFIGURATION_SAVE_ERROR_NOT_SAVED_T: An error error has occurred while saving the configuration in the database.
ORA_CONFIGURATION_SAVE_ERROR: An error has occurred while saving the robot configuration.
ORA_CONFIGURATION_DELETE_ERROR: An error has occurred while deleting the robot configuration, please try it again!
ORA_PROGRAM_CONFIGURATION_NOT_COMPATIBLE: Program is not compatible with the configuration
ORA_PROGRAM_ERROR_ID_INVALID: The name of your  program is already used by the system. Please choose another name and try it again!
ORA_PROGRAM_GET_ONE_ERROR_NOT_LOGGED_IN: You are not logged in, please log in with your username and password or create a new user.
ORA_PROGRAM_SAVE_ERROR_PROGRAM_TO_UPDATE: The program could not be found, so it is impossible to update it.
ORA_PROGRAM_SAVE_ERROR_NO_WRITE_PERMISSI: You don't have the permission to modify this program!
ORA_PROGRAM_SAVE_ERROR_OPTIMISTIC_TIMEST: This program has been changed recently by someone else. You can save your changes in a new program, choose >save as< !
ORA_PROGRAM_DELETE_ERROR: An error error has occurred while deleting the configuration. Please try it again!
ORA_PROGRAM_IMPORT_ERROR: This program is not a valid NEPO program and cannot be uploaded!
ORA_USER_GET_ONE_ERROR_ID_OR_PASSWORD_WR: You have entered wrong user name or password. Please try again!
ORA_USER_CREATE_SUCCESS: Your user account »$« was successfully created!
ORA_USER_CREATE_ERROR_NOT_SAVED_TO_DB: The given user name already exists in the database, please choose another user name.
ORA_USER_DELETE_SUCCESS: Your account »$« was successfully deleted. Hope to see you soon again!
ORA_USER_DELETE_ERROR_NOT_DELETED_IN_DB: Error while deleting user in database.
ORA_COMPILERWORKFLOW_ERROR_PROGRAM_NOT_F: The program could not be transformed into the robots programming language.
ORA_COMPILERWORKFLOW_ERROR_CONFIGURATION: The robot configuration could not be found on the server.
ORA_COMPILERWORKFLOW_ERROR_PROGRAM_TRANS: The program could not be transformed into the robots programming language.
ORA_COMPILERWORKFLOW_ERROR_CONFIGURATION: The robot configuration could not be transformed into the robots programming language.
ORA_COMPILERWORKFLOW_ERROR_PROGRAM_STORE: The program could not be saved because of an internal error.
ORA_COMPILERWORKFLOW_ERROR_PROGRAM_COMPI: The program could not be transformed into machine code.
ORA_COMPILERWORKFLOW_ERROR_PROGRAM_GENER: The program could not be generated.
ORA_ROBOT_NOT_WAITING: The robot does not wait for a run command.
ORA_ROBOT_PUSH_RUN: Robot waited and now the jar is pushed to the robot
ORA_ROBOT_FIRMWAREUPDATE_IMPOSSIBLE: An error has occurred while updating the new firmware on your robot.
ORA_ROBOT_NOT_CONNECTED:
There is no robot connected. Check if your robot is switched on, connect it to the server and type in the robot's password under robot - connect in the menu.
If you have problems to do this, please have a look at our help pages.
ORA_PROGRAM_TO_SHARE_DOES_NOT_EXIST: The program that you would like to share does not exist.
ORA_USER_TO_SHARE_DOES_NOT_EXIST:
The user with which you would like to share the program does not exist.
Try it again!
ORA_USER_TO_SHARE_SAME_AS_LOGIN_USER: You cannot share any programs with yourself.
ORA_USER_CREATE_ERROR_MISSING_REQ_FIELDS: Please make sure you have filled in all required fields! Your account couldn't be created.
ORA_USER_CREATE_ERROR_CONTAINS_SPECIAL_C: You are using some one or more special characters in your account name! Please remove them. Your account couldn't be created.
ORA_USER_CREATE_ERROR_ACCOUNT_LENGTH: Your account name or your user name is to long. Please make sure that they are not longer then 25 digits. Your account couldn't be created.
ORA_USER_EMAIL_ONE_ERROR_USER_NOT_EXISTS: This email address is unknown, maybe you have spelled it wrong!
CONFIGURATION_ERROR_SENSOR_MISSING: This sensor is not set to the port!
CONFIGURATION_ERROR_SENSOR_WRONG: Connected wrong sensor to the given port!
CONFIGURATION_ERROR_MOTOR_LEFT_MISSING: Left motor missing in the configuration!
CONFIGURATION_ERROR_MOTOR_RIGHT_MISSING: Right motor missing in the configuration!
CONFIGURATION_ERROR_MOTOR_MISSING: Motor is missing on the given port!
VALIDATION_SECOND_PASSWORD_EQUAL: The two passwords must be equal!
VALIDATION_VALID_EMAIL_ADDRESS: Please enter a valid email address!
SIM_BLOCK_NOT_SUPPORTED: Unfortunately you can not use this block in the simulation!
SIM_CONFIGURATION_WARNING_SENSOR_MISSING: This sensor is not in the configuration! The behavior of the program on the real robot will be different than expected!
SIM_CONFIGURATION_WARNING_WRONG_SENSOR_P: In this block you have used a wrong sensor port! The behavior of the program on the real robot will be different than expected, please check the robot configuration!
SIM_CONFIGURATION_WARNING_WRONG_INFRARED: The infrared sensor is not connected in the configuration! The behavior of the program on the real robot will be different than expected, please check the robot configuration!
SERVER_NOT_AVAILABLE: The Open Roberta Lab is currently not available. </br> Please check your internet connection and try to reload this website. If the problem persists, please don't hesitate to contact us via mail:</br>roberta-zentrale@iais.fraunhofer.de
MENU_MESSAGE_DOWNLOAD: Your program has been successfully downloaded.
POPUP_PROGRAM_TERMINATED_UNEXPECTED: The execution of the program on the robot has terminated unexpectedly!
TOUR1_DESCRIPTION01:
Welcome,
click on »next« and start a tour through the Open Roberta Lab.
I'll show you how you can program your robot with NEPO.
You can end this tour all the time with a click on »X« in the right upper corner.
TOUR1_DESCRIPTION03:
Here you can find everything you need to program the robot!
Save and load programs
Connect your robot to the Open Roberta Lab
Help for all kinds of problems
Everything about user accounts, e.g. login or logoff
TOUR1_DESCRIPTION04: Click here and switch to the robot configuration
TOUR1_DESCRIPTION05:
You can adapt the robot configuration later,
if you've constructed another robot.
If you don't have a robot and want to test your program in the simulation
this configuration is applied.
TOUR1_DESCRIPTION06: Click here and switch back to the programming area!
TOUR1_DESCRIPTION07:
The toolbox.
Here you can find all programming blocks.
TOUR1_DESCRIPTION08:
Each program starts with the program-start-block«.
Further programming blocks, which the robot should execute, should be attached to this block.
Just drag'n drop the desired block right under the start block.
TOUR1_DESCRIPTION09:
Here you find some shortcuts!
From left to right:
Click here to execute the program on the real robot
Click here to start the robot in the simulation
Save your program, but before that you need to sign in
Click here and zoom in on the blocks, if you want to
The trashcan! Just move blocks into the trashcan and they will be deleted.
       Attention: You cannot recover blocks once they are deleted!
TOUR1_DESCRIPTION12: Now drag'n drop the new block just below the start-program-block so that they are connected
TOUR1_DESCRIPTION13a: and test your program in the simulation!
TOUR1_DESCRIPTION15:
Perfect,
your robot is driving 20 cm forward,
this is what you have programmed!
TOUR1_DESCRIPTION16: Bye and have fun trying out more!
LIGHT_GETSAMPLE_TOOLTIP: Gets the current reading from the light sensor.
SOUND_GETSAMPLE_TOOLTIP: Gets the current reading from the sound sensor.
WRITE_TO_PIN_TOOLTIP: Sends the value to chosen pin.
CONFIGURATION_ERROR_MOTORS_ROTATION_DIRE: The direction of rotation of the left and right motor is different!
CONFIGURATION_ERROR_MULTIPLE_RIGHT_MOTOR: You have multiple right motors assigned to your configuration!
CONFIGURATION_ERROR_MULTIPLE_LEFT_MOTORS: You have multiple left motors assigned to your configuration!
WAIT_TIME_TOOLTIP: Waits for a certain time in milliseconds.
ORA_TOKEN_SET_ERROR_WRONG_ROBOTTYPE:
You are trying to connect a robot of a different type as selected in the menu.
Please switch the robot type in the robot's menu and try to connect again!
ORA_USER_ERROR_EMAIL_USED: There is already an account with this email address registered. Please enter another email address!
ORA_USER_PASSWORD_RECOVERY_EXPIRED_URL: The link is not valid anymore. Please ask for resetting your password again, if you still cannot remember it!
ORA_USER_PASSWORD_RECOVERY_SENT_MAIL_FAI: Sorry, we cannot send a mail to you, please contact »roberta-zentrale@iais.fraunhofer.de«
ORA_USER_PASSWORD_RECOVERY_SENT_MAIL_SUC: We send a mail to you, please check your mailbox!
ORA_USER_UPDATE_SUCCESS: Your password has been successfully changed!
MOTOR_ARDU_TOOLTIP: Represents a Bot'n Roll chassis motor.
NXTBRICK_TOOLTIP: Represents the NXT brick with connected actors and sensors. There are also inbuilt actors and sensors available, e.g. buttons, display ...
ARDUBRICK_TOOLTIP: Represents the Bot'n Roll board with connected actors and sensors. There are also inbuilt actors and sensors available, e.g. pushbuttons, display ...
EV3BRICK_TOOLTIP: Represents the EV3 brick with connected actors and sensors. There are also inbuilt actors and sensors available, e.g. buttons, display ...
ORA_PROGRAM_IMPORT_ERROR_WRONG_ROBOT_TYP:
You are trying to import a program for a robot of a different type as selected in the menu.
Please switch the robot type in the robot's menu and try to import again!
TEMPERATURE_GETSAMPLE_TOOLTIP: Gets the current reading from the temperatur sensor.
COMPASS_GETSAMPLE_TOOLTIP: Gets the current reading from the compass sensor.
MICROPHONE_GETSAMPLE_TOOLTIP: Gets the current reading from the microphone in % (mapped to 0 - 100). If the value is always low, the value has to be multiplied by 10, because the amplification is missing on the hardware.
CALLIOPEBRICK_TOOLTIP: Represents Calliope, a pocket-sized codeable computer. There are also inbuilt actors and sensors available, e.g. buttons, display ...
MICROBITBRICK_TOOLTIP: Represents micro:bit, a pocket-sized codeable computer. There are also inbuilt actors and sensors available, e.g. buttons, display ...
LED_ON_TOOLTIP: Turns the LED on and changes the color.
COLOUR_RGB_TOOLTIP: Creates a color with the given red, green, and blue values. Values should be between 0 and 255.
IMAGE_TOOLTIP: Creates an image for the display.
IMAGE_INVERT_TOOLTIP: Inverts the image. Each pixel with value 0 or none will be set to # or 9 and pixels with value # or 9 will be set to 0 or none.
IMAGE_SHIFT_TOOLTIP: Shifts the image in the given direction by the given number
ACCELERATION_TOOLTIP: Get the acceleration value in milli-gravitys.
ACCELEROMETER_ROTATION_TOOLTIP: Get the tilt or rotations in degrees.
POPUP_DOWNLOAD_STEP_A: Right click on your program link below and
POPUP_DOWNLOAD_STEP_C: click on your connected »$« in the left column,
POPUP_DOWNLOAD_STEP_D:
now click on the »Save« button on the bottom right.
If your program doesn't start automatically press the reset button after a while.
POPUP_DOWNLOAD_CHECK: Okay, I've changed the download folder of my browser permanently. Don't show this popup again and download my programs directly.
NAO_MODE_TOOLTIP: Turns the stiffness of the robot's motors on and goes to a standing posture, or goes to a resting posture and turns the stiffness off.
NAO_APPLYPOSTURE_TOOLTIP: Robot goes into the selected posture.
NAO_POINTLOOKAT_TOOLTIP: Rbbot points or looks at a given position
NAO_STIFFNESS_TOOLTIP: The stiffness of the selected body part is turned on or off
NAO_WALK_TOOLTIP: Makes the robot walk a distance.
NAO_TURN_TOOLTIP: Turns the robot for number of degrees
NAO_WALKTO_TOOLTIP: The robot walks to the give position.
NAO_RANDOMEYES_TOOLTIP: The color of the eyes is changed randomly for a specified amount of time.
NAO_RASTA_TOOLTIP: The color of the eyes is changed between green, yellow and red for a specified amount of time.
NAO_GYROMETER_TOOLTIP: Get the current reading from the gyrometer in the given direction.
NAO_ACCELEROMETER_TOOLTIP: Get the current reading from the accelerometer in the given direction
NAO_TOUCHSENSOR_TOOLTIP: Is true if touch sensor on the robot is touched.
NAO_NAOMARK_TOOLTIP: Get the number of a detected Nao Mark.
NAO_TAKEPICTURE_TOOLTIP: Takess a picture and save it on the robot.
NAO_RECORDVIDEO_TOOLTIP: Records a video and saves it on the robot.
NAO_FSR_TOOLTIP: Get the current reading from the force sensitive resistor under the feet of the robot.
NAO_PLAYFILE_TOOLTIP: Plays a sound file from the robot.
NAO_DIALOG_TOOLTIP: The robot tries to recognize the phrase and answers on success.
NAO_RECOGNIZEDWORD_TOOLTIP: Returns the last word the robot recognized.
NAO_LED_TOOLTIP: Set the color of a group of LEDs.
NAO_LEARNFACE_TOOLTIP: Learn and save a face under a given name
NAO_FORGETFACE_TOOLTIP: Forget a face previously saved under a given name
NAO_DETECTFACE_TOOLTIP: Detect a face previously saved under a given name
NAO_SAY_TOOLTIP: The robot says the given text.
NAO_GETCURRENT_TOOLTIP: Get the electric current from the selected joint.
NAO_SETINTENSITY_TOOLTIP: Set the intensity of a group of LEDs.
NAO_CHAT_TOOLTIP: Add a reaction if a word is recognized.
MENU_CODE_DOWNLOAD_TOOLTIP: Download the source code of your program on the computer
MENU_CODE_REFRESH_TOOLTIP: Refresh the source code, if you have changed the NEPO Block's.
MENU_SIM_START_TOOLTIP: Start your program in the simulation.
MENU_SIM_STOP_TOOLTIP: Stop your program in the simulation.
MENU_SIM_IMPORT_TOOLTIP: Upload your own simulation background image, it will be appended at the end of the background's list.
DISPLAY_GET_PIXEL_TOOLTIP: Returns the brightness for this led. 0 means the led is turned off, 9 is the brightest value.
DISPLAY_SET_PIXEL_TOOLTIP: Sets the brightness for this led. 0 means the led is turned off, 9 is the brightest value.
DISPLAY_GET_BRIGHTNESS_TOOLTIP: Returns the brightness for all leds of the display. 0 means all leds are turned off, 9 is the brightest value.
DISPLAY_SET_BRIGHTNESS_TOOLTIP: Sets the brightness for all leds of the display. 0 means all leds are turned off, 9 is the brightest value.
POPUP_STARTUP_TOUR_TEXT: Would you like to get started, but do not know exactly how? We will show you the first steps in an interactive tutorial.
POPUP_STARTUP_HELP_TEXT: In our detailed help, we will explain everything you need, from building instructions to frequently asked questions.
ORA_USER_GROUP_SAVE_AS_ERROR_USER_GROUP_: This user already belongs to the group
PROGLIST_DELETE_ALL_TOOLTIP: Click here to delete all selected programs.
PROGLIST_DELETE_TOOLTIP: Click here to delete your program.
PROGLIST_SHARE_TOOLTIP: Click here to share your program with a friend.
PROGLIST_LOAD_TOOLTIP: Click here to load your robot configuration in the configuration environment.
CONFLIST_DELETE_ALL_TOOLTIP: Click here to delete all selected programs.
CONFLIST_DELETE_TOOLTIP: Click here to delete your robot configuration.
CONFLIST_LOAD_TOOLTIP: Click here to load your robot configuration in the configuration environment.
PROGLIST_DELETE_SHARE_WITH_GALLERY: Your program is allready shared with the gallery. If you change it, it will be automatically updated. Do you want to remove your program from the gallery?
PROGLIST_SHARE_WITH_GALLERY: Do you really want to share your program with everybody?
POPUP_GET_LINK: Here is the link to your actual program. Please don't change it, it probably won't work anymore. It's already copied to your clipboard!</br>$
ORA_USER_ACTIVATION_SENT_MAIL_SUCCESS: We send a mail to you, please check your mailbox!
ORA_USER_ACTIVATION_SENT_MAIL_FAIL: Sorry, we cannot send a mail to you, please contact »roberta-zentrale@iais.fraunhofer.de«
ORA_USER_ACTIVATION_SUCCESS: Activation of the user account is successful!
ORA_ACCOUNT_NOT_ACTIVATED_TO_SHARE: Your are not allowed to share. Please activate your account!
JOYSTICK_GETSAMPLE_TOOLTIP: Gets the current reading of one of the axises of the joystick
PIN_GETSAMPLE_ANALOG_TOOLTIP: Returns the value from the specified analog pin. The value is between 0 and 1023.
PIN_GETSAMPLE_DIGITAL_TOOLTIP: Returns the value from the specified digital pin. The value is either HIGH »1« or LOW »0«.
PIN_GETSAMPLE_PULSEHIGH_TOOLTIP: Returns the pulse HIGH on a pin in microseconds or -1 if no complete pulse was received within the timeout.
PIN_GETSAMPLE_PULSELOW_TOOLTIP: Returns the pulse LOW on a pin in microseconds or -1 if no complete pulse was received within the timeout.
CONNECTION_MBED_RECEIVE_TOOLTIP: Waits for a message on channel 0 - 255.
CONNECTION_MBED_SEND_TOOLTIP: Sends a message to another microBoard. You can use the channel from 0 to 255 and specify a signal strength from 0 - 7, where 0 is very low and 7 is the strongests.
